sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Action) Once per session, if the character is incapacitated due to exceeding his wound threshold, he may perform the Against All Odds action (this action may be performed even though characters are normally barred from performing actions when incapacitated). The character makes a Hard (♦♦♦) Resilience check, rolling a number of force dice (white d12) equal to his Force rating as part of the check. If successful, the character heals wounds equal to number of successes. The character may spend force points from the roll to add successes to the result.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Against all odds</name> <number>TAL0001002</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 14:47:38</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4cdb2d2cdbe20c542901de90cf961992</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 15:02:04</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
